SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H1H_1_00: The art of fighting with two weapons demands great concentration.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H1H_1_01: You carry two weapons at the same time - so use them.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H1H_1_02: You can block quickly and strike back fast.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_2_01: A strong swordfighter doesn't just whack at his opponent.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_2_02: He is aware of his opponent's position. Swing with your body, not just your arm.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_2_03: Remember that and use it. Then you'll live longer.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_3_00: Always keep your eye on your opponent.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_3_01: Some blows can be blocked, others can't.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_1H_3_02: Recognize the difference. Then you can dodge the blows or even beat your opponent to it.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Axe_1_00: Grip the axe firmly with both hands and make sure that you have a solid stance.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Axe_1_01: A couple of strong blows, always at the body, should be enough to knock down any opponent.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_00: You have to be fast, but you also have to remain calm.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_01: You need a steady hand and a good eye.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_02: Otherwise, you're just wasting your arrows.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_00: Hold the crossbow by the shaft, press it against your shoulder for a steady aim.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_01: For the first few days, it will feel like your shoulder is ready to fall off.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_02: But after just a week, your shoulder will be like a rock!
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_03: Aim at your target and pull. That's it.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_1_00: You have to be careful. Your prey will always be alert.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_1_01: Find a good place to shoot from and aim at the beast's heart.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_00: You won't be able to bag large animals with just one shot.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_01: Before you can kill it, you have to weaken it.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_02: Aim at different vulnerable spots. And be quick so that it doesn't have time to kill you.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_03: Once it is weakened, it is only a question of time before you kill it.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_ResistHeat_01: Move as little as possible and save your strength.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_ResistHeat_02: The heat can be more exhausting than fighting a whole herd of monsters.

SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_1_02: It will protect you against most attacks - even against arrows!
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Shield_1_03: Oh, yes, one more thing. The shield does not belong on your weapon arm!
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_00: This is quite different from sneaking up on people!
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_01: Stalking is the only way to get within reach of a wild animal.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_02: Always creep up from behind - and don't think that the animal won't be able to scent you!
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_03: If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.

SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophyFur_02: Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophySkin_01: To lift off the skin, carefully make an incision.
SVM_Ass_Elite_Hard_Teach_TrophySkin_02: Then remove it from back to front - but do it very slowly!

SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PoisonArrow_00: You need poison and a couple of arrows.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PoisonArrow_01: Then CAREFULLY dunk the arrowheads in the phial.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PoisonArrow_02: You need a steady hand, so take your time.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PoisonBlade_00: First, you need a weapon and the poison.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PoisonBlade_01: Avoid dunking the whole blade in the poison.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PoisonBlade_02: Apply it in a thin coat only on the edge and the tip.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PoisonBlade_03: And make sure that you don't cut yourself.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionMP_00: Ah! Mana potions. Their power develops in their effect.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionMP_01: They are a source of pure magic power.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionMP_02: There are various recipes for these potions.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionMP_03: So get yourself one, find the necessary ingredients, and go for it!
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionPerm_01: With this knowledge, you'll be able to brew ANY permanent potion.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionPerm_02: All you need is a recipe and the required ingredients.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionPerm_03: Most ingredients are very rare, so you will be out and about a lot.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionPoison_00: Basically, poison is no different than a regular healing potion.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionPoison_01: You need a recipe, the ingredients, and an alchemist's bench.
SVM_Ass_Fat_Hectic_Teach_PotionPoison_02: Dump it all together and stir well. When it becomes a sticky substance, you're finished.

SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_AdanosTeacher_00: Sometimes a fight can't be avoided. Now you have the weapons you need.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_AdanosTeacher_01: Adanos has chosen you to wield his magic. Use it well!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_AdanosTeacher_02: You bear a great power. Use it for the good of the world.

SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_MobDismiss: We'll meet at the assembly point!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_NotEnoughGold: You don't have enough gold with you!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_NotEnoughLP: You don't have the necessary experience!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Ooh_01: Come on. You can take him!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_PartyDismiss: You know where you can find me.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_00: You have to be fast, but you also have to remain calm.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_01: You need a steady hand and a good eye.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Bow_2_02: Otherwise, you're just wasting your arrows.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_HeavyArmor_00: Most people make the mistake of not putting their armor on properly.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_HeavyArmor_01: All parts of the armor must be firmly connected.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_HeavyArmor_02: Not so tightly that you cannot move.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_HeavyArmor_03: But tightly enough so that there are no weak spots left in the armor.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Hunter_1_00: You have to be careful. Your prey will always be alert.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Hunter_1_01: Find a good place to shoot from and aim at the beast's heart.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_00: You won't be able to bag large animals with just one shot.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_01: Before you can kill it, you have to weaken it.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_02: Aim at different vulnerable spots. And be quick so that it doesn't have time to kill you.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Hunter_2_03: Once it is weakened, it is only a question of time before you kill it.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Mining_01: Swing the pickaxe into the rock and start hacking.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Mining_02: But use regular strokes. Then you'll get more chunks out of the rock.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_SharpenBlade_00: Go to the whetstone and let it rip.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_SharpenBlade_01: Slowly draw the blade from left to right, and hone it evenly.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_SharpenBlade_02: That makes it nice and sharp.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Smith_2_01: The principle is the same as in forging weapons.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Smith_2_02: Heat the blank, work it, cool it.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Smith_2_03: But of course, a magic ore weapon needs a magic ore blank.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_00: This is quite different from sneaking up on people!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_01: Stalking is the only way to get within reach of a wild animal.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_02: Always creep up from behind - and don't think that the animal won't be able to scent you!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_Sneak_2_03: If you get too close, it's over. So the best weapon for hunting is the bow.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_TrophyFur_00: Slit the prey open and remove the skin with a jerk!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_TrophyFur_01: The most important thing is: always from back to front!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_TrophyFur_02: Once you know how to do it, it's no problem.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_TrophySkin_01: To lift off the skin, carefully make an incision.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_TrophySkin_02: Then remove it from back to front - but do it very slowly!
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_TrophyTeeth_00: Above all, you have to make sure that the stuff doesn't splinter.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_TrophyTeeth_01: Jam your knife deep into the flesh and uncover the trophy.
SVM_Ass_Old_Hard_Teach_TrophyTeeth_02: Once you're in deep enough, lever it out.

SVM_Ass_Old_Wise_Teach_StaffMagic_00: Take the staff in your hands and feel its energy.
SVM_Ass_Old_Wise_Teach_StaffMagic_01: Probe this energy and bring it into harmony with your spirit.
SVM_Ass_Old_Wise_Teach_StaffMagic_02: Only then can you merge the powers of the staff with your own.
SVM_Ass_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_1_00: A staff is awfully long. You can use that to keep your opponents at bay.
SVM_Ass_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_1_01: If you strike properly, almost no one will have a chance against you.
SVM_Ass_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_2_00: Your opponent will always underestimate a staff. It doesn't seem as dangerous as a sword or an axe.
SVM_Ass_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_2_01: Use that. There are maneuvers that aren't possible with a sword.
SVM_Ass_Old_Wise_Teach_Staff_2_02: If you can surprise your opponent, you've almost won.

SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H1H_1_00: The art of fighting with two weapons demands great concentration.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H1H_1_01: You carry two weapons at the same time - so use them.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H1H_1_02: You can block quickly and strike back fast.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H_2_01: A strong swordfighter doesn't just whack at his opponent.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H_2_02: He is aware of his opponent's position. Swing with your body, not just your arm.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H_2_03: Remember that and use it. Then you'll live longer.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H_3_00: Always keep your eye on your opponent.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H_3_01: Some blows can be blocked, others can't.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_1H_3_02: Recognize the difference. Then you can dodge the blows or even beat your opponent to it.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Axe_1_00: Grip the axe firmly with both hands and make sure that you have a solid stance.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Axe_1_01: A couple of strong blows, always at the body, should be enough to knock down any opponent.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Crossbow_1_0: Hold the crossbow by the shaft, press it against your shoulder for a steady aim.
For the first few days, it will feel like your shoulder is ready to fall off.
But after just a week, your shoulder will be like a rock!
Aim at your target and pull. That's it.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_HeavyArmor_0: Most people make the mistake of not putting their armor on properly.
All parts of the armor must be firmly connected.
Not so tightly that you cannot move.
But tightly enough so that there are no weak spots left in the armor.

SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Mining_02: But use regular strokes. Then you'll get more chunks out of the rock.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_SharpenBlade: Go to the whetstone and let it rip.
Slowly draw the blade from left to right, and hone it evenly.
That makes it nice and sharp.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Shield_1_00: The way of the shield is the way of the soldier. Listen:
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Shield_1_01: Your shield is your best friend. So always carry it with you!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Shield_1_02: It will protect you against most attacks - even against arrows!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Clear_Teach_Shield_1_03: Oh, yes, one more thing. The shield does not belong on your weapon arm!

SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Barter_00: No, I can't do that. You'll have to pay more for that.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Barter_01: Listen! I paid you, so teach me!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Barter_02: But look - you can already do it.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Barter_03: When you're trading, you'll see that you get better prices.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Excuse_00: A useful skill if you ever have trouble with the guards.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Excuse_01: The important thing is to come across convincingly.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Excuse_02: So, speak with a firm voice and look the guy straight in the eye!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Excuse_03: Then you assert something, anything. Just don't say, 'I can explain'!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Lockpick_2_00: Ah, you want to get at the really valuable stuff.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Lockpick_2_01: Hold the lockpick with just your fingertips. Then you have more feeling.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Lockpick_2_02: You can tell if you push the locking mechanism in the right direction from the noise it makes.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Pickpocket_1_: Involve your victim in a conversation.
You wouldn't believe how carelessly some people secure their purses. Often, you can just pull them from their pockets.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Dumb_Teach_Pickpocket_2_: No problem. You have enough talent for that.

SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H1H_1_00: The art of fighting with two weapons demands great concentration.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H1H_1_01: You carry two weapons at the same time - so use them.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H1H_1_02: You can block quickly and strike back fast.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H_2_01: A strong swordfighter doesn't just whack at his opponent.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H_2_02: He is aware of his opponent's position. Swing with your body, not just your arm.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H_2_03: Remember that and use it. Then you'll live longer.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H_3_00: Always keep your eye on your opponent.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H_3_01: Some blows can be blocked, others can't.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_1H_3_02: Recognize the difference. Then you can dodge the blows or even beat your opponent to it.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Axe_1_00: Grip the axe firmly with both hands and make sure that you have a solid stance.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Axe_1_01: A couple of strong blows, always at the body, should be enough to knock down any opponent.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Barter_00: No, I can't do that. You'll have to pay more for that.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Barter_01: Listen! I paid you, so teach me!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Barter_02: But look - you can already do it.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Barter_03: When you're trading, you'll see that you get better prices.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_00: Hold the crossbow by the shaft, press it against your shoulder for a steady aim.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_01: For the first few days, it will feel like your shoulder is ready to fall off.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_02: But after just a week, your shoulder will be like a rock!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Crossbow_1_03: Aim at your target and pull. That's it.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Excuse_00: A useful skill if you ever have trouble with the guards.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Excuse_01: The important thing is to come across convincingly.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Excuse_02: So, speak with a firm voice and look the guy straight in the eye!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Excuse_03: Then you assert something, anything. Just don't say, 'I can explain'!
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Lockpick_2_00: Ah, you want to get at the really valuable stuff.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Lockpick_2_01: Hold the lockpick with just your fingertips. Then you have more feeling.
SVM_Ass_Warrior_Hard_Teach_Lockpick_2_02: You can tell if you push the locking mechanism in the right direction from the noise it makes.
